page.title: 14POLICE COLLEGE
page.content: At the{Police College,}which is run by the{Hampshire Constabulary,}there are two main office blocks. The number of cadets and officers varies from week to week. Officers attend courses on many different aspects of police work. The Police College is situated in spacious grounds. There are also many good{sports facilities.}Above the main office blocks are the students' dormitories. There are some classrooms in the police college and some outside huts. There is a pavillion at the end of the car park where meetings are held. There are televisions and videos in all the classrooms.
